column5: Does anybody here have any experience with this product??  Thanks

Just picked one up from BPS.  I've been playing with it and it is very sharp and clear. Will hopefully get it wet over next few days. I bought it for scouting structure and not to have it on all day. I had an older aqua vu and it was just way too big for me to haul around

Just picked one up few weeks ago. Used it three times. Worked well. Very clear and excellent battery life. I will get a camera panner for it because finding your lure can be tricky. In murky water with current on Quinte i was still able to see walleye come up to my jig.
Oh and fill out a rebate online for a carrying case and car charger.
